scripts.precodegen:kovan: rimraf src/generated && yarn script template --deployment kovan
scripts.precodegen:kovan-dev: rimraf src/generated && yarn script template --deployment kovan
scripts.precodegen:kovan-local: rimraf src/generated && yarn script template --deployment kovan
scripts.precodegen:mainnet: rimraf src/generated && yarn script template --deployment mainnet
scripts.precodegen:mainnet-local: rimraf src/generated && yarn script template --deployment mainnet
scripts.precodegen:dev: rimraf src/generated && yarn script template --deployment mainnet
scripts.precodegen:staging: rimraf src/generated && yarn script template --deployment mainnet
scripts.deploy:kovan: graph deploy enzymefinance/enzyme-kovan subgraph.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:kovan-dev: graph deploy enzymefinance/enzyme-kovan-dev subgraph.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:kovan-local: graph deploy enzymefinance/enzyme-kovan subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy enzymefinance/enzyme subgraph.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:mainnet-local: graph deploy enzymefinance/enzyme subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/
scripts.deploy:dev: graph deploy enzymefinance/enzyme-dev subgraph.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:staging: graph deploy enzymefinance/enzyme-staging subgraph.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
